channel.description: Recent content in need on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: Microsoft releases DirectStorage: ‘a new era of fast load times and detailed worlds in PC games’ (3 minute read) Microsoft’s DirectStorage API has arrived for Windows.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-04
item.description: Google announces Pixel 5, Pixel 4A 5G, and Pixel 4A all at once (7 minute read) Google has announced the Pixel 4A, Pixel 5, and the Pixel 4A 5G.
